summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation charges, discounts, and VAT, totaling $95.73. The invoice also includes shipment details and payment instructions.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 15, 2003, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $95.73, including transportation charges, discounts, and VAT.
The shipment was picked up on September 5, 2003, and delivered on September 8, 2003.
Elisabeth Maxwell and Ghislaine Maxwell are mentioned as recipients of a package shipped via FedEx.
The invoice includes detailed shipping charges and payment instructions.
